item.title: Container Pipeline Exercise
item.description: aws s3 mb s3://devsecops-james-strong –region us-west-2 make_bucket: devsecops-james-strong go Terraform file terraform/config.tf terraform { backend “s3” { bucket = “devsecops-james-strong” key = “devsecops-james-strong/terraform_state” region = “us-west-2” } }
